plugin.name: LazySearch2
plugin.title: LazySearch2
plugin.desc: Lazy Search Music is a plugin that lets you search for music without having to multi-tap each letter in the search text you're after, and displays search results "as you type". This plugin works with the original infra-red remote control, and doesn't affect the operation of the Controller.
plugin.creator: Stuart Hickinbottom

plugin.name: AutoRescan
plugin.title: AutoRescan
plugin.desc: AutoRescan is a plugin that will detect changes to your music folder and will automatically trigger a rescan if any files have been added, removed or changed. This means changes to appear in your music library automatically. Note that Windows users need to be running a 'source code' version of SqueezeCenter under ActivePerl - see the plugin website for further details.
plugin.creator: Stuart Hickinbottom
